Home

Tachyon

Tachyon is an open source memory-centric distributed storage system enabling reliable data sharing at memory-speed across cluster jobs, possibly written in different computation frameworks, such as Spark and MapReduce.

Tachyon logo

Visit Tachyon Homepage

Switch to Code example

Tachyon is being developed by a large community.
